logica
Class Ship

java.lang.Object
  logica.Ship

public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object

Implements the Ship Class. A ship has a name, size, base position and a flag that indicates if it has been sunk. The size attribute indicates both X and Y sizes. That is, if the size is 2, then the ship is a 2 by 2 square.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Vitor / Caio
